title: Game mode idea: More-buff
body:
A mysterious man has taken Morello's place and taken over league's balance team.
He buffed the champions so much that they became as strong as their strongest patch!

thoughts?

replies.body: well guys, I guess im playing jax  to 1v5 in the enemy fountain, just like the olden days.
since the dodge itemisation and runes has disappeard i don't know how you will 1v5 in the enemy fontain and dodge no longer dodge turret shot.
but that was as strong as his strongest patch. there tends to be a good reason for nerfs, is what I was getting at.
nop, i said they buffed champions but they didn't revert any mechanics and they didn't changed the itemization

Guess bard is fucked.

EDIT: Ekko basically stays the same,  strongest has to mean opest and non buggy.
He isnt on any sort of good list xD, he hasnt got a really good patch.. he has only gotten buffs not nerfs so he wasnt once op.
not a problem, they can just buff him. The point of this mode if just to put every champion on god-mode for fun. No need of balance
